patthana13.16:1.1_0: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namaggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.16:1.1_1: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namaggahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.16:1.1_2: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namaggādhipati dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.16:1.1_3: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namaggārammaṇo ca namaggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.16:1.1_4: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namaggahetuko ca namaggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.16:1.1_5: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namaggārammaṇo ca namaggahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.16:1.1_6: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namaggārammaṇo ca namaggahetuko ca namaggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
